curriculum.title: Trading Criptocurrency for Beginners
curriculum.description: This curriculum is designed to introduce beginners to the world of cryptocurrency trading. Covering fundamental concepts, trading strategies, risk management, and practical tools, it aims to equip learners with the knowledge and skills needed to start trading cryptocurrencies effectively.
learningOutcomes: Understand the basics of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology
Identify major cryptocurrencies and their unique features
Develop and apply basic trading strategies
Manage risks associated with cryptocurrency trading
Use trading platforms and tools effectively

week1.objective: Understand the fundamentals of cryptocurrencies and how blockchain technology works

resource2.description: Video explaining the basics of cryptocurrencies

activities.activity1: Create a glossary of key blockchain and cryptocurrency terms

interactiveElements.name: Article on the history of Bitcoin

week1.feedback: Peer review of glossary entries in forum

supplementaryMaterials.name: Article on the history of Bitcoin

week1.realWorldApplications: Case study on Bitcoin and its impact on financial markets
week1.accessibilityFeatures: Subtitles for videos, text alternatives for images
week1.communitySupport: Introduction thread in forum for learners to share their backgrounds and goals
week1.reflection: Reflective journal prompt on how blockchain can change the world

week2.objective: Identify and understand the top cryptocurrencies and their ecosystems

activities.activity1: Research and present on one major cryptocurrency

supplementaryMaterials: Podcast on the future of cryptocurrencies
week2.realWorldApplications: Discussion on the use cases of selected cryptocurrencies
week2.communitySupport: Study groups for deep dives into each cryptocurrency
week2.reflection: Journal entry on the potential of your chosen cryptocurrency

week3.objective: Learn the basics of how to trade cryptocurrencies

resource2.description: Video tutorial on using a cryptocurrency exchange

activities.activity1: Simulated trading exercise using historical data

week3.feedback: Group discussion on trading strategies used in simulation
supplementaryMaterials: Article on the psychology of trading
week3.realWorldApplications: Analysis of a recent cryptocurrency market event
week3.reflection: Reflect on the emotional aspects of trading and how they affect decisions

week4.objective: Understand and apply basic trading strategies and risk management techniques

resource2.description: Video on risk management in crypto trading

activities.activity1: Develop a personal trading strategy incorporating risk management

week4.realWorldApplications: Case study on a successful trader and their strategy
week4.reflection: Journal on the importance of risk management

week5.objective: Learn to navigate and utilize features of cryptocurrency trading platforms

activities.activity1: Create and share a technical analysis of a current cryptocurrency chart

week5.realWorldApplications: Discussion on the impact of trading platforms on market dynamics
week5.accessibilityFeatures: High-contrast mode for charts and analysis tools
week5.communitySupport: Online forum for sharing analysis and receiving feedback
week5.reflection: Reflective essay on the role of technology in trading

week6.objective: Compile knowledge from the course to create a comprehensive trading plan

resource1.description: Steps to building a trading plan

resource2.description: Video on the importance of a trading plan

activities.activity1: Final project: Present your trading plan

supplementaryMaterials: Template for a cryptocurrency trading plan
week6.realWorldApplications: Guest speaker on their experience with trading plans
week6.accessibilityFeatures: Accessible presentation options for final project
week6.reflection: Final reflection on learning journey and future trading goals

curriculum.certification: Certificate of Completion for Cryptocurrency Trading for Beginners
